channel.title: How do i change monsters hp levels?
channel.description: please help me i really wanna change a monsters hp lvl but how do i, im not much of a person who know much about computers so please explain it throughly thanks a lot

item.title: How do i change monsters hp levels?
item.dc:creator: @im_a_beast im a beast
item.description:
@im_a_beast wrote:

wrong section but il be glad to help
first
go to ur npc.cfg
second
look for what npc hp u wanna change (use ctrl f) to search for em
third
once u found the hp of the npc go to ur server and see how much hp it has by calculating its hp by killing it
fourth
once u have its exact hp or near its exact just change it to whatever u want it to be
fifth
compileâ€¦ and ur done =]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change monsters hp levels?
